Hey thanks for your help. 

I tried to comment all those lines away (only f=
ound two occasions) saved it and rebuild, but still got shared_ptr erros.

=
However, I installed visual studio 2008 and used cmake to make 2008 project=
 files and build those with 2008. 
Also I succeeded in building the boost s=
tage libraries.

However, the JGTL and hyperneat solutions still fail to bu=
ild, and I suspect boost is the cause. 

I changed the paths to the stage l=
ib correctly in cmake (this only had to be done for JGTL and hyperneat) to =


lib\boost_1_45_0\stage\lib

And now I get errors like this when trying to=
 build either JGTL or hyperneat

--- In neat@yahoog=
roups.com, "jgmath2000" <jgmath2000@...> wrote:
>
> It looks like visual st=
udio 2010 provides its own shared_ptr class, so now you have two shared_ptr=
 classes, the visual studio 2010 one and the boost one.
> 
> Find and remov=
e any lines like this in the code:
> 
> #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
> 
=
> and that should fix it.
> 
> --- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "delodic" <rbk6=
00@> wrote:

to c++ and building libraries and
